server-offline.title: Server Offline
server-offline.message: The game server is currently unavailable. This could be due to maintenance or technical issues.
suggestions: Check your internet connection
Try again in a few minutes
Contact support if the issue persists

no-internet.title: No Internet Connection
no-internet.message: Unable to connect to the internet. Please check your network connection.
suggestions: Check your WiFi or mobile data connection
Restart your router if using WiFi
Try switching networks
Check if other websites are loading

games-not-loading.title: Games Not Loading
games-not-loading.message: The games are having trouble loading. This might be a temporary issue.
suggestions: Refresh the page
Clear your browser cache
Try a different game
Check if JavaScript is enabled

blocked-content.title: Content Blocked
blocked-content.message: This content appears to be blocked by your network or firewall.
suggestions: Try using a VPN if available
Check with your network administrator
Try accessing from a different network
Use the proxy feature if available

browser-compatibility.title: Browser Not Supported
browser-compatibility.message: Your browser may not be fully compatible with this content.
suggestions: Update your browser to the latest version
Try using Chrome, Firefox, or Edge
Enable JavaScript in your browser settings

server-error.title: Server Error
server-error.message: The server encountered an internal error. Please try again later.
suggestions: Wait a few minutes and try again
Clear your browser data
Contact support if the issue continues

game-corrupted.title: Game File Corrupted
game-corrupted.message: The game files appear to be corrupted or incomplete.
suggestions: Refresh the page to reload the game
Clear browser cache and cookies
Try accessing the game later

maintenance-mode.title: Under Maintenance
maintenance-mode.message: The service is currently under maintenance. Please check back later.
suggestions: Check the service status page
Follow social media for updates
Try again in a few hours

rate-limited.title: Too Many Requests
rate-limited.message: You've made too many requests. Please wait before trying again.
suggestions: Wait a few minutes before retrying
Reduce the frequency of your requests
Check if you're making unnecessary requests

insufficient-storage.title: Storage Full
insufficient-storage.message: Your browser storage is full and cannot save game progress.
suggestions: Clear browser cache and cookies
Remove unused browser extensions
Free up space in your browser storage
